```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```


``` {r load}
who <- read.csv("who_life_exp.csv")
```


``` {r glimpe}
glimpse(who)
```

``` {r summary}
summary(who)
```

```{r stats}
who %>%
  filter(region == "Americas" & year == 2016) %>%
  distinct(country)
```

```{r stats2}
who %>%
  group_by(region) %>%
  summarize(min_life = min(life_expect),
            max_life = max(life_expect))

```
  
```{r gni-capita-life-exp}
ggplot(who, mapping = 
         aes(x = gni_capita,
             y = life_expect,
             color = region)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~region)

```


```{r time-life-exp}
ggplot(who, mapping = 
         aes(x = year,
             y = life_expect,
             color = region)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~region)

```

```{r life-exp-childhood-obesity}
who %>%
  filter(region == "Africa") %>%
  ggplot(mapping = 
         aes(x = age5.19obesity,
             y = life_expect,
             color = year)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~region)
```


```{r life-exp-childhood-thin}
who %>%
  filter(region == "Africa") %>%
  ggplot(mapping = 
         aes(x = age5.19thinness,
             y = life_expect,
             color = year)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~region)
```
